Highlights

The Dragos Platform

During my time at Dragos, I played a key role in the development of the Dragos Platform, a leading OT cybersecurity solution. As a Staff User Interface Engineer, I contributed to a variety of key initiatives:

Learn more about Dragos

LIMRA Financial Services Website

At Brightfind, I worked on the LIMRA website, a SiteCore CMS with a Vue.js front-end built on top of ASP.NET. As the front-end lead, I was responsible for developing components, meeting with clients to gather requirements, working with UX designers and overseeing the implementation.

See my work at LIMRA

Fun Stuff

See my Github page for my current public repositories. I have made full stack CRUD apps, SPAs, web-based games, and even a MAME front-end for my arcade using C++. I also created a static site generator, Webgen, which was used to make this very site!
